titles.title: I Do Not Ask O Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I do not ask O Lord that life may be A pleasant road I do not ask That thou wouldst take from me Aught of its load{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I do not ask That flowers should always spring Beneath my feet I know too well The poison and the sting Of things too sweet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For one thing only Lord dear Lord I plead Lead me aright Though strength should falter And though heart should bleed Through peace to light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I do not ask O Lord That Thou shouldst shed Full radiance here Give but a ray of peace That I may tread Without a fear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I do not ask my Cross to understand My way to see Better in darkness Just to feel Thy hand And follow Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Joy is like restless day But peace divine Like quiet night Lead me O Lord Till perfect day shall shine Through peace to light{/lang-eng}
